ygData.subject: Re: Another Feign Death post.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... system). ... Of course I used FD before the patch. I pull better than most monks, and I m just an SK. I was trained by a monk (THE premiere monk on Fennin)
ygData.messageBody:
> did you actually use feign before the patch?
>
> you couldn't possibly have - and believe that this new fd system is "more"
> predictable...or even predictable at all (compared to the previous
system).
> i for one KNOW how fd worked before (the verant posted is complete bs, a
> blatant lie) and i know how it works now.

Of course I used FD before the patch. I pull better than most monks, and I'm
just an SK. I was trained by a monk (THE premiere monk on Fennin) and I know
how to feign, believe me. My point was not whether the new FD was better or
worse, I refuse to go down that road. I'm telling you how it is NOW, after
the fact. You can use that information or you can bitch and moan. I was
trying to give you some advice on how the new FD is best used, even in its
"nerfed" state, and you insult me. I guess I'll just go back to lurking on
the list, sorry to post.

Dravith
